# Portfolio of Bony Koshy
> Incoming Associate at Accenture | Full Stack Developer | FSD Architect

## Core Competencies
- **Primary Stack:** React 19, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS.
- **Architecture:** Feature-Sliced Design (FSD), Modular Monolith.
- **UI Systems:** Radix UI (Headless Accessibility), Framer Motion (Orchestration), Shadcn UI.
- **Performance:** Interaction to Next Paint (INP) optimization, Prerendering (SSG), Code Splitting.
- **Security:** Zod Validation, Dependency Auditing.

## Professional Summary
Senior frontend engineer specializing in scalable React architectures. Unlike typical portfolios, this codebase implements rigorous engineering standards including automated linting boundaries, accessibility-first primitives, and build-time optimization strategies.

## Featured Projects

### 2026 Gold Standard Portfolio
- **Type:** System Architecture
- **Tech:** React 19, Vite 7, FSD, GSAP, Framer Motion, PWA.
- **Architecture:** Feature-Sliced Design.
- **Key Challenge:** Maintaining performance while handling heavy SVG filter animations and complex state transitions in React 19.
- **Outcome:** Implemented Feature-Sliced Design (FSD) to decouple business logic from UI, ensuring 100% modularity.

### Local AI Sentiment Analysis
- **Type:** AI & Hardware
- **Tech:** Python, Intel OpenVINO, Optimum Intel, Hugging Face, Flask.
- **Key Challenge:** Ensuring stable inference on NPU drivers by implementing strict padding and static shape management for the model input.
- **Outcome:** Optimized a DistilBERT model using Intel OpenVINO for native execution on NPUs, achieving millisecond latency locally.

## Education & Certifications
- AWS Certified
- Google Certified
- IBM Certified
- Microsoft Certified
